tasks.label: Build automaton
args: call "E:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && cl.exe /Zi /EHsc /std:c++17 /nologo /MD /O2 /I"E:\automaton\src\include" /I"E:\automaton\src\include\model" /I"E:\automaton\src\include\zlib" /I"C:\GL\GLAD\include" /I"C:\GL\GLFWx64\include" /I"C:\GL\GLM" /I"C:\Users\Alexandre\Downloads\freetype-master\freetype-master\include" @E:\automaton\sources.rsp /FoE:\automaton\obj\ /Fe:E:\automaton\bin\automaton.exe /link /LIBPATH:"C:\GL\GLFWx64\lib-vc2022" /LIBPATH:"C:\Users\Alexandre\Downloads\freetype-master\freetype-master\build\Release" /LIBPATH:"E:\automaton\lib" glfw3.lib opengl32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib shell32.lib comdlg32.lib ole32.lib freetype.lib zlib.lib
